skills.name: Round decimals to the nearest whole number
Round numbers to one decimal place

explanations.A: 4.36 is between 4 and 5. It is closer to 4 so we would round to 4.
explanations.B: I think you have rounded to 1 decimal place. We need to round to the nearest 1.
explanations.C: Not quite. 4.36 is between 4 and 5, but which is it closer to?
explanations.D: I think you have tried to make the number into a whole number by taking out the decimal. When we round we need to find the whole number that 4.36 is nearest to, without changing its place value
